WRITING.TITLE: No experience in IT - wanna get my CCNA - Advice?
WRITING.TEXT: I basically just finished college for marketing and have absolutely no experience with IT whatsoever but wanna get into IT now. I don't wanna go back to college so I just wanna get cisco certified. Everyone I know in IT tells me to get my CCNA. I started by watching CCNA study videos on youtube and built myself a little mini lab at home so far with a few switches and learning to use putty. That's all I have done so far. Any advice on how I can teach myself, especially with literally no IT knowledge except for the basic that any millenial has?

woah thank you so much! what a great help! I'll get all of that. :) I was gonna take the composite but my friend who already took it said I should take the ccent first and then the ccna. I really want to take the test before february though.
What a great response! Thank you very much. That helps!

Thank you for your response. I want to get into network engineering or systems engineering. But have heard that the routing and switching ccna is the one I should start with and if I want to get into something else I still can. Also I have a Network engineer in my family that I can ask for help with that.

Thank you so much!! That #8217;s great. That #8217;s exactly what I was thinking. I am learning subnetting and switching right now but I don #8217;t even understand the hardware so getting some pc #8217;s to work on and learn on is a great idea. Thank you! I will try that.
Haha I was gonna try that next. I like learning as much as there is so I #8217;m hoping I #8217;ll get into coding at some point as well.

Do you have any kind of degree for IT though? I am just worried that no degree regarding IT plus only a small certification wouldn #8217;t even get me a help desk job ( which is where I #8217;d wanna start out)
Great advice!! Thanks. I will go that way then. I was just worried that the new ccna test will be significantly harder. Do you think that will be the case?

Thanks so much! I have already studied subnetting and it #8217;s really easy and fun by now and I get it very well. I haven #8217;t gotten to IPv6 yet because I #8217;m an learning switching right now but I #8217;m glad to hear you say it #8217;s not so much harder than IPv4. Thank you for your advice. You #8217;re very right. It #8217;s good to hear from people that have been in IT for a while.
Great advice! I #8217;ll go for the comptia first then. Thank you!
Dang that #8217;s awesome. Congratulations!! That #8217;s commitment. Thank you. Any advice on study materials that helped you a lot?

Haha thank you so much!! That is awesome! Thank you for providing all the links. I #8217;ll look into it right away. As for the coffee I am already there, man. I work full days where I study every minute I can and then come home and study way into the night. #128514; I feel you.
Oh happy cake day! #9786; #65039;

Haha I can relate. My horse is brown with beige and black accents in the summer and incredibly chill, cuddly, loving and lazy. In winter he #8217;s a black as the night, furry, a-hole lunatic that you can barely ride because of his insane energy and the last thing he wants is to cuddle or chill. I don #8217;t have good answer for you because I often seem to annoy people as well for no reason. What I have noticed though is that there are certain people that just get offended or annoyed by literally anything. The people that are nice and worth talking to wouldn #8217;t do that unless you really crossed a line. So my suggestion would be to just directly communicate to them that you have a hard time with that and you do not mean to cause any offense at all. And that if you do cause them offense to please know it is not your intention and to please tell you so that you can learn to avoid that in the future. Kind people worth talking to will understand. The ones that wouldn #8217;t aren #8217;t worth talking to. IMO
The why Caf #233; is short and sweet :)

You're doing really well. Just a few suggestions: While going over the jump you should already know where you want to go after it and then put more of your weight into the stirrup of the side you are trying to go. That way your horse can land in the correct lead. Overall using your weight pushing down into one stirrup more than the other and looking where you're going is a great way to get your horse to go in the right directions rather than using the reins when you're standing in the stirrups. (I hope that was helpful. Sorry for the bad way of explaining, English is not my first language)

That's an immature thing to say in my opinion. I don't know how old you are but at a certain point in life you will realize that looks and love have very litle to do with each other. If I am being honest I believe that there isn't really true love in a lot of relationships between very beautiful people and they often date each other for the body not for the soul. I have seen many couples in which one person is by far less physically attractive than the other one. It doesn't matter. They love each other. love goes beyond looks. It's about compatability and finding someone that you have a great time with and you know they will always be there no matter what. I know i. e. that I am considered very attractive in societies standards but I would never want a partner that likes me for my looks. What if my face gets burned in a grease fire or I gain a lot of weight after pregnancy or I end up disabled from an accident. I want a partner that will always love me for me and I will always love them for them. Real mature people know that. #8203; Of course theres a difference between "not exactly physically attractive" and just "doesn't take care of themselves" one thing you can't do anything about and it doesn't matter and one thing is your choice and makes you unattractive to people. But that is a different story.

oh gosh I used to do that. someone should have told me...so glad I came back to reality. it's good to be back lol
omg that's the funniest thing I have read on here!
THANK YOU! Theres many parents out there that need to hear this.

I went out of the back exit of a bar to smoke a cigarette with my friends when it was dark. When I get out there noone has any cigarettes and I see this guy a few feet over lighting one. So I walk up to him to ask him for a cigarette, he gives me one. I say thank you, he gets into his car and drives off. I turn around to my friends queitly staring at me. Turns out it was a famous german singer named Cro. I guess they knew more about him than me because he usually wears a mask so I had no clue what he looked like irl.
That #8217;s crazy! That just shows how toxic social media is
That mask falling off my face would just make my anger grow

I had the same problem. My advice as much as you might hate it: get a new pair of boots and only wear them when you ride. Then get rainboots to wear in the mud. It #8216;s a pain but it just keeps your rising boots nice for so much longer.

WRITING.TITLE: Instagram makes no sense for normal people anymore
WRITING.TEXT: I remember when instagram first started and it was about posting pictures about your life and what you're doing and your friend followed you and you followed them and it was just a fun and interesting way to keep up with your friends all around. Now it's all about influencers. People either ARE influencers or wanna be them and pretend like they are. It's a breeding ground for narcicissts. People just post for attention, likes, followers and comments. Noone cares about the content of their friends and the only reason people like posts and comment is because they're hoping to get likes and comments in return. I can't even spend a fun afternoon or a birthday with my girlfriends because everything has to be instagrammable. You gotta take a picture before eating and take a picture before leaving the house. Post that you#re spending time together and tag each other. It's sooooo stupid. It's like everyone is addicted to it and just staring into their phone. Even the conversations start with "have you seen what XY posted on instagram?" It's all about living a fake life for the gram and then gossiping about people living a fake life on the gram. Important life events are no longer communicated to your friends and family through a phone call or in person but posted on instagram. "We are pregnant" or "I said yes".I'm literally the odd one out and know nothing about my friends lives anymore because I deleted my instagram and it's really sad. sorry for the long rant.

Also I loved the gloomy setting in washington state. Anyone have an idea for something I might like?
you're totally right. Just not sure how adults with full time jobs make friends. Especially without social media (facebook, IG) lol currently trying to get the hang of it.
I don't understand this. Did I say it wrong? English isn't my first language sorry.
that's awesome! hold on to those friends. gosh I miss school.
oh I just meant my friends that are girls not my friends that are boys. because they don't do that.
ooooh thanks for clarification! lol I have been using it wrong so long. People must have thought I was super weird.
looks like if lil miquaela had a grandmother
what a beautiful reminder and what a beautiful girl! :) You are very right. They love us and try so hard for us. Even if things don't always go perfect. lt;3

Oh sorry. They are called MERZ Haut Haare N #228;gel. But I don #8217;t think they have anything specific in them that others don #8217;t

Teenage mutant ninja turtles! Sorry had to correct you it was driving me crazy #128514;
my dad did exactly that to me when I was 22 and I feel like I need therapy now
Omg I wanna buy it and hang it in my home!
Omg I usually don't comment on a lot of posts but you look so amazinggg. what an inspiration. Love how happy you look in the second picture!
You should call it #8222;nomatoe sauce #8220;

What helps me is to try to stay within the lines and make every letter touch the lower line but not go over it. The lower letters are half of one line and the upper case letters are one whole line long.

WRITING.TITLE: I bought an iPhone X at Walmart while on vacation in the USA, worked with my sim until now, tried a different SIM and realized it's sim locked
WRITING.TEXT: My Sim was always from german t-mobile but now I tried a different provider and turns out my phone is sim locked but I bought it "unlocked" from walmart back then. Does that mean it's sim locked to t-mobile? how can I get it unlocked since I don't even know why it is locked and which provider it is locked on? Update: I have now figured out the model number and part number is MQA52LL/A / A1865 meaning it's a sim-free unlocked united states model that: "... doesn #8217;t ship with a carrier SIM card. The SIM-free iPhone sold on apple.com and at the Apple Store is unlocked. That means you #8217;re free to use a SIM card from any carrier that provides service for iPhone. " Which now makes me wonder even more. I have now tried a telekom sim card and a O2 Sim card, both german. Neither work in my iphone. Both are accepted by my android just fine. Any other ideas? Here are the three SIM cards. The one on top ist the old t-mobile Germany that works the other two don #8216;t work. Looks like it #8217;s about the SIM cards itself? [SIM CARDS](https://imgur.com/gallery/hlCDmly)
It was a simple "unlocked iphone x" from walmart. I didn't purchase a sim card with it at all. It didn't have any carrier branding on it.

I bought it in the U.S and didn't use it with a sim card there because I didn#t have an americna sim card. I flew back to germany a day later witht he phone and put my german t-mobile sim card in the phone, it worked fine. then I put a different german t-mobile sim card in the phone. it worked fine. now today I bought a new german prepaid sim card from t-mobile as well. It still shows the card as invalid. So it doesn't matter which card, it just doesn't accept any card except for the one I had. Could something be broken? It always worked with german cards before, always by t-mobile I put the card in my phone and it immediately says #8222;activation required #8220; I accept It tries to activate and then says #8222;SIM not valid - The SIM card that you currently have installed in this iPhone is from a carrier that is not supported under the activation policy that is currently assigned by the activation server. This is not a hardware issue with the iPhone. Please insert another SIM card from a supported carrier or request that this iPhone be unlocked by your carrier. Please contact apple for more information #8220;
It is not. I doubled checked with the people that were there when we bought it. We specifically drove to a different walmart just to get an unlocked iphone x that is not branded to any carrier
Model Number: MQA52LL/A / A1865

WRITING.TITLE: Advice Needed: Moving + pregnant cat / kittens
WRITING.TEXT: I have two cats. One of them is currently pregnant. The babies should literally come any day now. All of a sudden now we have to move in the next 3 weeks and new people want to look at my apartment before we move. The landlords don't want the cats there when people are coming over and I honestly don't know if it's a good idea either. What should I do? should I bring the cats to my parents while people are coming over or is that way too much stress for the mama, especially once she has her babies? How can I move the mama and the kittens safely? it's a three hour car ride but we really have to move. Any advice?

WRITING.TITLE: My pregnant cat and I need to move
WRITING.TEXT: My cat is pregnant and due any day now but we have to move in 2 - 3 weeks to another state 3 hours away. It came very sudden and was not planned. How can I move her safely? Would it be wise to take her to my parents house for a little and then move her after the move is done? Or will it be too much stress? Hoe much stress is too much stress? What do I do?

I am hoping there will only be one day where a few people come. but I thought maybe I could move her to my parents until the move so she won't hear any of the stress including movers. If I put her in a room she will hear all the commotion going on and might get really freaked out. She is very easily scared so that's what I worry about. But then if I move her location twice home to parents to new home, she might even get more stressed.
that helps a lot! thank you so much!

that's great advice! thank you. We won't have any small rooms in the new home. Any advice on what I can put in the big room she will be in to make her feel safe. Not like she's in a big open space with nothing in there? She is a very nervous cat so I want to make her feel as comfortable as possible.

WRITING.TEXT: Species: Cat Age: one week old Sex: no clue Breed: Maine Coon/ Tabby Mix Body Weight: idk History: none Clinical signs: sneezing Duration: two days Location: Germany They don #8216;t sneeze all the time but a few times a day. The mama sneezes every once in a while but is active and playing. The kittens have been sleeping basically non stop. Not moving around at all. Either sleeping or drinking milk. I #8216;d like to repost it on my ig. How can I best give you credit? #9786; #65039;

Kann mich dabei nur anschlie #223;en! Ich wollte immer warten und wurde von allen in meinem Leben so beredet und beeinflusst dass ich in das Gegenteil umherschweift bin. Im Endeffekt war das der gr #246; #223;te Fehler meines Lebens. All die Jungs die mich wollten als ich mich nicht mehr aufbewahrt habe h #228;tte man echt in den M #252;ll kicken k #246;nnen und das war so wertlos und hat mir nichts gebracht. Jetzt hab ich meinen Mann gefunden und ich w #252;nschte ich h #228;tte mich f #252;r ihn aufbewahrt. Ich hab mit ihm sofort gemerkt dass wir f #252;r immer zusammen sein wollen und zusammen passen und daf #252;r mussten wir nicht vorher miteinander schlafen um das zu wissen. Nur weil es nicht weit verbreitet ist hei #223;t das nicht dass die Mehrheit die richtige Entscheidung trifft. Du triffst f #252;r dich die richtige Entscheidung. Lass dir blo #223; von keinem rein reden. Du machst das schon richtig. Ein echter Mann f #252;rs Leben wird f #252;r dich warten. #8216;

I just stopped saying things of value and kept conversations shallow and meaningless and at some point (took me two years) they finally got the picture. WRITING.TITLE: DAE ALWAYS feel super angry?
WRITING.TEXT: Like I have some zen times but other times I just get sooooo angry and easily angered and triggered by EVERYTHING and I can not control it. I find myself cussing people out in my head, I want to break things, throw things, scream, I am soooo angry and for the tiniest reasons. It #8217;s not good or healthy. It #8217;s where my self harm used to stem from too. Anyone else get like this? Anyone know how to deal with it? I #8217;m desperate

That used to be me and the only reason I stopped acting on it was because I found myself in an abusive relationship where my abuser would hurt me if I did those things and that pain was worse than controlling myself so the good that came out of that bad relationship was the self control I earned. But I can totally relate!

WRITING.TITLE: Help!! Any immediate help for flare ups?
WRITING.TEXT: I am going through the worst flare up I have ever had. Everything I usually do, drink tons of water to make myself pee a lot all at once, take a hot bath, breathing and stretching to get blood flowing, bladder tea, do not help and it #8217;s been hours. I can #8217;t take it anymore. I #8217;m sitting in my bathtub in pain. I usually don #8217;t take any pain medications even though my doctor told me to but I just try to stay away from them. But right now I #8217;d be willing to take anything to stop the pain. Any ideas what could help? Anyone have anything? Any pain meds that help?
Omg I have always done this. It #8217;s so sad. Every single time I chant #8220;I want to go home #8221; This is crazy. At least now I know I #8217;m not alone #128563;

Thank you so much. I usually try to hold it as long as I can. But today it is so bad that I have no control over my bladder anymore. I feel like I should be wearing diapers #128514; it #8217;s so bad. Thank you so much. I will try Tylenol
How much baking soda?

WRITING.TITLE: Got a German Shepherd puppy today and I have some questions
WRITING.TEXT: 1. how long can I walk her per day? I had a German Shepherd/boxer mix for 11 years and he ended up having major hip arthritis. Now I am so cautious but I don #8217;t know how cautious is too cautious? What can she do? What shouldn #8217;t she do? 2. is it better to use treats or toys as positive reinforcement? 3. do I give her baths? How often? 4. anything that I should know that I absolutely should not do? An other advice?

So many people talk about hip scoring and genetics but doesn #8217;t it also have to do with how much you excercise them as puppies? Like walking, jumping etc? My gsd/boxer mix had it so bad he could barely walk by the time he was 9 and I #8217;ve always told myself it was because I walked him too much and let him jump around as a puppy. Was that wrong? Is it really mostly genetic?
